name: LOVE Smoothing Conditioner for Frizzy Hair
about: What it is:A smoothing conditioner that tames coarse, frizzy, or unruly hair, leaving hair controlled, detangled, and shiny..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Smooths frizzy or curly hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Minuta Olive Extract: Fatty acids and vitamin E to nourish, soften, moisturize..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan..What Else You Need to Know:This anti-frizz smoothing conditioner tames coarse, frizzy, or unruly hair, leaving hair controlled, detangled and shiny for a sleek, smooth look. Infused with Minuta olive extract from Slow Food Presidia, rich in fatty acids and vitamin E, it contributes to provide nourishment and softness.
ingredients: -Minuta Olive Extract: Fatty acids and vitamin E to nourish, soften, moisturize. ..Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum / Fragrance, Dicaprylyl Ether, Lauryl Alcohol, Amodimethicone/Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Oryza Sativa Cera / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Disodium Edta, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Olea Europaea Fruit Extract / Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Trideceth-5, Polyquaternium-10, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Ci 60730 / Ext. Violet 2, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After rinsing out shampoo, apply a small amount of conditioner to lengths and ends. .-Comb through and leave on five to 10 mins. .-Rinse thoroughly, towel dry and use your favorite styling products to blow dry.

reviews.review_title: Smells like cheap perfume and makes my hair crunch
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted from Davines in exchange for my honest review. I was extremely excited to try this LOVE smoothing conditioner by davines, and let me tell you, this did not disappoint! I then rinsed it out, and my hair was so smooth and soft! It did a great job of detangling my hair. I also noticed my hair was less frizzy than usual when it dried. I really like the creamy consistency and texture of this conditioner. A little definitely goes a long way, which I appreciate, as it will last a while. The scent is also lovely! Nice and fresh and not overpowering, which I love! This conditioner has honestly become one of my favorite conditioners, and has quickly become a staple in my haircare routine. I will absolutely be purchasing more products from this brand! If you are looking for a great quality conditioner that actually works, then I HIGHLY recommend you try this LOVE conditioner from davines!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color of the conditioner and despite the somewhat flimsy packaging, it has a charming, artisanal feel, reminiscent of something you'd discover at a local farmers market. Love made my hair more manageable, but the standout benefit was the enhanced curl definition it provided. Recently, my hair had been looking a little limp, but after incorporating Love into my routine, my curls have never looked better. While the scent is a bit unusual, its excellent performance more than makes up for it and makes it easy to overlook.

It makes my hair feel soft, moisturised, manageable, and shiny without leaving it greasy. I like it very much and would recommend it to my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free. I recently tried Davines Love Smoothing Conditioner, and it has quickly become a must-have in my hair care routine. The texture of this conditioner is incredibly thick, which initially surprised me. Despite its consistency, my hair wasn't weighed down at all—instead, it felt deeply moisturized and very soft. The fragrance is strong but nice, reminiscent of clean laundry hung outside in the middle of an herb garden, which I absolutely love.   What I appreciate most about this conditioner is its ability to smooth my frizzy, wavy hair without compromising volume and natural movement. The results are long-lasting, even between washes, which is perfect for my busy lifestyle. Plus, Davines' commitment to sustainability makes me feel good about using their products. If you're struggling with frizz and want a reliable, high-quality conditioner, I highly recommend giving Davines Love Smoothing Conditioner a try.
